languages.text: "Также спешу поделиться с вами и добрыми вестями: полный ремонт {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}"Бессердечного"{/d} завершен! Его корпус стал намного прочнее, а истребители в ангаре прошли все циклы технолитаний и рвутся в бой!"

"I have good news to share as well: the {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Heartless{/d} is fully repaired! Its hull has been considerably reinforced, and, after a complete cycle of tech-litanies, the fighter craft in its hangar now eagerly await the chance to show their worth in battle!"
languages.original_text: "Также спешу поделиться с вами и добрыми вестями: полный ремонт {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}"Бессердечного"{/d} завершен! Его корпус стал намного прочнее, а истребители в ангаре прошли все циклы технолитаний и рвутся в бой!"

traits.locale_text: "I have good news to share as well: the {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Heartless{/d} is now fully repaired! Its hull has been considerably reinforced, and, after a complete cycle of tech-litanies, the fighter craft in its hangar now eagerly await the chance to show their worth in battle!"

"I have good news to share as well: the {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Heartless{/d} is now fully repaired! Its hull has been considerably reinforced, and, after a complete cycle of tech-litanies, the fighter craft in its hangar now eagerly await the chance to show their worth in battle!"

"I have good news to share as well: the {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Heartless{/d} is fully repaired! Its hull has been considerably reinforced, and, after a complete cycle of tech-litanies, the fighter craft in its hangar now eagerly await the chance to show their worth in battle!"

"I have good news to share as well: the {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Heartless{/d} is fully repaired! Its hull has been considerably reinforced, and, after a complete cycle of tech-litanies, the fighter craft in its hangar now eagerly await the chance to show their worth in battle!"

"I have good news to share as well: the {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Heartless{/d} is fully repaired! Its hull has been considerably reinforced, and, after a complete cycle of tech-litanies, the fighter craft in its hangar now eagerly await the chance to show their worth in battle!"

"I have good news to share as well: the {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Heartless{/d} is fully repaired! Its hull has been considerably reinforced, and, after a complete cycle of tech-litanies, the fighter craft in its hangar now eagerly await the chance to show their worth in battle!"

languages.text: 「良い知らせもあります。{d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}ハートレス{/d}は完全に修理が完了しました！船体は大幅に強化され、技術連祷の一連の儀式が終了した後、格納庫の戦闘機は戦いでその価値を示す機会を今か今かと待ち望んでいます！」
languages.original_text: "I have good news to share as well: the {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Heartless{/d} is fully repaired! Its hull has been considerably reinforced, and, after a complete cycle of tech-litanies, the fighter craft in its hangar now eagerly await the chance to show their worth in battle!"

traits.locale_text: 「良い知らせもあります。{d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}ハートレス{/d}は完全に修理が完了しました！船体は大幅に強化され、技術連祷の一連の儀式が終了した後、格納庫の戦闘機は戦いでその価値を示す機会を今か今かと待ち望んでいます！」

languages.text: "Güzel haberlerim var! {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Taşkalp'in{/d} tamamen onarıldığını bildirmekten memnuniyet duyuyorum! Gövde önemli ölçüde güçlendirildi ve tekno ilahilerle geçen tam bir döngünün ardından hangardaki savaş gemileri, çatışmada becerilerini gösterme şansını bekliyor!"
languages.original_text: "I have good news to share as well: the {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Heartless{/d} is fully repaired! Its hull has been considerably reinforced, and, after a complete cycle of tech-litanies, the fighter craft in its hangar now eagerly await the chance to show their worth in battle!"

traits.locale_text: "Güzel haberlerim var! {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Taşkalp'in{/d} tamamen onarıldığını bildirmekten memnuniyet duyuyorum! Gövde önemli ölçüde güçlendirildi ve tekno ilahilerle geçen tam bir döngünün ardından hangardaki savaş gemileri, çatışmada becerilerini gösterme şansını bekliyor!"

languages.text: «También tengo buenas noticias: la {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Desalmada{/d} está completamente reparada! Su casco ha sido reforzado considerablemente y, tras las tecnoletanías adecuadas, ¡los cazas de su hangar esperan la ocasión de demostrar su valía en combate!».
languages.original_text: "I have good news to share as well: the {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Heartless{/d} is fully repaired! Its hull has been considerably reinforced, and, after a complete cycle of tech-litanies, the fighter craft in its hangar now eagerly await the chance to show their worth in battle!"

traits.locale_text: «También tengo buenas noticias: la {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Desalmada{/d} está completamente reparada! Su casco ha sido reforzado considerablemente y, tras las tecnoletanías adecuadas, ¡los cazas de su hangar esperan la ocasión de demostrar su valía en combate!».

languages.text: “我也有个好消息要告诉您，{d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}无心号{/d}的修理工作已经彻底完成了！舰体得到了相当程度的加固。此外，经过此次全方位的技术更新之后，战斗机驾驶员也已经迫不及待，渴望在战斗中证明自己的价值！”
languages.original_text: "I have good news to share as well: the {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Heartless{/d} is fully repaired! Its hull has been considerably reinforced, and, after a complete cycle of tech-litanies, the fighter craft in its hangar now eagerly await the chance to show their worth in battle!"

traits.locale_text: “我也有个好消息要告诉您，{d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}无心号{/d}的修理工作已经彻底完成了！舰体得到了相当程度的加固。此外，经过此次全方位的技术更新之后，战斗机驾驶员也已经迫不及待，渴望在战斗中证明自己的价值！”

languages.text: "Ich habe aber auch gute Neuigkeiten: die {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Heartless{/d} wurde vollständig repariert! Ihr Rumpf wurde deutlich verstärkt und nach einem vollständigen Zyklus von Tech-Litaneien warten die Jäger in ihrem Hangar nur darauf, Euch ihren Wert im Kampf zu beweisen!"
languages.original_text: "I have good news to share as well: the {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Heartless{/d} is fully repaired! Its hull has been considerably reinforced, and, after a complete cycle of tech-litanies, the fighter craft in its hangar now eagerly await the chance to show their worth in battle!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe aber auch gute Neuigkeiten: die {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Heartless{/d} wurde vollständig repariert! Ihr Rumpf wurde deutlich verstärkt und nach einem vollständigen Zyklus von Tech-Litaneien warten die Jäger in ihrem Hangar nur darauf, Euch ihren Wert im Kampf zu beweisen!"

languages.text: « J'ai aussi une bonne nouvelle à vous annoncer : les réparations du {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Sans-Cœur{/d} sont à présent terminées ! Nous avons considérablement renforcé la coque, et après un cycle complet de technolitanies, le chasseur est désormais prêt à vous prouver l'étendue de ses capacités. Il vous attend dans le hangar. »
languages.original_text: "I have good news to share as well: the {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Heartless{/d} is fully repaired! Its hull has been considerably reinforced, and, after a complete cycle of tech-litanies, the fighter craft in its hangar now eagerly await the chance to show their worth in battle!"

Nous avons considérablement renforcé la coque, et après un cycle complet de technolitanies, le chasseur est désormais prêt à vous prouver l'étendue de ses capacités. Il vous attend dans le hangar. »
